adjective.description: Relating to or characteristic of the island of Rarotonga in the South Pacific, the chief island of the Cook Islands, or its people or language.
examples: the website was designed by a Rarotongan company

noun.description: A native or inhabitant of the island of Rarotonga in the South Pacific, the chief island of the Cook Islands.
examples: they took in the Rarotongan as a foster child

noun.description: The language of the island of Rarotonga in the South Pacific, the chief island of the Cook Islands.
